amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for section 8 housing by $614 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Public and Indian Housing Programs by $614,000,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A032) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A032) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Grothman.
